name: The Treasure Team
description:
GAME IS NOT FINISHED, the ending is missing. it's not playable yet, too many bugs unfortunately...

This game was made during the Wholesome Game Jam 2022. We had 48 hours to make it! The theme was 'Community'

The hunt is on! There's hidden treasure buried deep in the archipelago, and it's up to you to find it! Everyone who was led here has a unique clue that can help reveal its secret location. Will you be persuasive enough to convince them to reveal their secrets? Make friends and solve puzzles to win the treasure!

CONTROLS: 

LEFT AND RIGHT TO MOVE
E TO INTERACT
ESCP TO OPEN THE MENU

TEAM MUURMU | credits

Atsio: Project manager, writer, game designer

AW0L: Character designer, background artist, animator

Nomanina: Developper

Petrol4brains: Composer, sound designer

Sam-: Developper

Taffy: Character designer, animator, 2D artist, UI artist
